<article style=""><h1>Can we trust new mobility systems&amp;quest;</h1><p>At CES 2016 last week&amp;comma; automotive was once again a large focus not only for NXP&amp;comma; but for the entire conference&amp;period; Each year&amp;comma; the presence of cars and automotive-related technologies grows at an incredible rate&amp;period; So much so that some &amp;lpar;at least in our own automotive teams&amp;rpar; call CES the "car electronics show&amp;period;"</p><img src="http://blog.nxp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/PANELISTS-943x425.jpg" /></article>
